text: Kalwaria may refer to any of the Polish towns named after Calvary (the site of Jesus's crucifixion): *Góra Kalwaria, sanctuary near Warsaw *Kalwaria Pacławska, sanctuary near Przemyśl *Kalwaria Zebrzydowska, sanctuary near Kraków *Kalwaria, Pomeranian Voivodeship ==See also== *Kalvarija (disambiguation)
title: Kalwaria
